data.title: Sverdlovsk, RU Climate Zone, Monthly Weather Averages and Historical Data
data.meta_description: Climate of Sverdlovsk, Russia. Information regarding Sverdlovsk climate zones and historical climate data including temperature and precipitation.
data.text:
Sverdlovsk, Russia Climate

Weather: 13.71°C/56.68°F, Wind SW at 4 km/h, 88% Humidity, 0.36% Chance of rain

Sverdlovsk Climate Summary

Located at an elevation of 270.04 meters (885.96 feet) above sea level, Sverdlovsk has a Humid continental, no dry season, warm summer climate (Classification: Dfb). The city’s yearly temperature is 3.93ºC (39.07ºF) and it is -1.34% lower than Russia’s averages. Sverdlovsk typically receives about 59.46 millimeters (2.34 inches) of precipitation and has 129.72 rainy days (35.54% of the time) annually.
